relation: Darrow2 - #38 After a failed attempt at bat, Ness makes with the escaping. This is sort of like pressing rewind on a VCR, only in comic form.
Darrow2 - #39 Jeff rejoins as the chase starts to build up. Also, Titanic Ant finally gets his backstory, only to have it cut short by Ness once again. Even in death the poor guy never gets a break.

Darrow2 - #40 Remember, when you're on fire, exclaim it as loudly and clearly as possible, so everyone can confirm that you actually are on fire. Letting people know if you're a mole or not is purely optional.

Darrow2 - #41 Heavily inspired by Yakety Sax, this five hour long cutscene was cut from Earthbound's initial release. Fortunately I have the original copy of the game, so I am bringing the truth to you in comic form. Please believe me, I am a trustworthy man.
Darrow2 - #42 Ness' hard work finally pays off and he's rewarded with...a diamond? What a ripoff!
